summary: Feature request to allow Logger configuration at the Worker level instead of globally via Runtime.install, enabling different logger instances for each Worker in multi-Worker test scenarios for isolation and per-test behavior control.
userImpact: Users running parallel tests with isolated Workers cannot configure different loggers per Worker, preventing per-test logging behavior and assertions on log output.
proposedFix: Allow the Logger to be configured at the Worker level instead of globally through Runtime.install
keyQuote: Allow the Logger to be configured at the Worker level. This would allow us to create a "test logger" instance for each test to enable what we want.
